archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.6.8b: b) informing DRM users of their obligation not to circumvent the DRM features (e.g. by printing screenshots or using a camera to perform unauthorised copies of information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
